name: Waterstone Financial, Inc.
description: Waterstone Financial, Inc. is a prominent financial institution that operates primarily through its wholly-owned subsidiary, WaterStone Bank SSB. Established in 1921, the company is headquartered in Wauwatosa, Wisconsin, and has built a reputation for providing a broad range of banking services to individuals and businesses. WaterStone Bank focuses on residential mortgage lending, commercial real estate, and retail banking, catering to the diverse needs of its clientele. The bank emphasizes personalized service and community involvement, reflecting its commitment to fostering economic growth in the areas it serves. Waterstone Financial also offers a variety of financial products, including savings accounts, checking accounts, and various loan options, designed to meet the needs of both personal and commercial banking customers. The company’s strategic initiatives include enhancing its digital banking capabilities and expanding its branch network, ensuring that it remains competitive in the evolving financial landscape. With a solid foundation built on customer trust and community relations, Waterstone Financial continues to strive for excellence in customer service and financial performance.

seo.meta_title: Waterstone Financial, Inc. | Community Banking and Financial Services
seo.meta_description: Explore Waterstone Financial, Inc., a community-focused bank offering personalized banking services and a range of financial products. Discover our commitment to customer service and community development.

faq.question: What services does Waterstone Bank offer?
faq.answer: Waterstone Bank offers personal banking, commercial banking, mortgages, and various financial products.

faq.question: Where is Waterstone Financial headquartered?
faq.answer: Waterstone Financial is headquartered in Wauwatosa, Wisconsin, USA.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Waterstone Financial?
faq.answer: Doug Gordon is the CEO of Waterstone Financial, Inc.
